[[Image:Isleys-essential.jpg|thumb|250px|right|The Isley Brothers during their hugely successful ''3 + 3'' period in one of the pictures from their [[1973]] photo shoot for their aptly titled ''3 + 3'' album that year.]]
  â  
This is a listing of all of the singles and albums released by legendary [[R&B]]/[[soul]] family singing group [[The Isley Brothers]]. Thirteen of their singles reached the ''[[Billboard magazine|Billboard]]'' Top 40 in the US while an impressive fifty-eight singles between [[1962]] and [[2006]] registered to the Top 40 on the US R&B singles chart, six of which went to #1 on the chart. Of all the songs released, forty of them were Hot 100 hits, four were [[Billboard Hot 100|Top 10 pop hits]] and most impressively, the Isleys are the only group and act to have had score Hot 100 singles spanning six consecutive decades.

Of all the songs released, forty of them were Hot 100 hits, four were [[Billboard Hot 100|Top 10 pop hits]] and most impressively, the Isleys are the only group and act to have had score Hot 100 singles spanning six consecutive decades.
